subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan scored 21 points and Katie Smith scored all 16 of her points in the second half to help the Detroit Shock tie the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Deanna Nolan scored 21 points and Katie Smith scored all 16 of her points in the second half to help the Detroit Shock tie the W.N.B.A. finals.
